::The Galactors/The Lavacons::

"Galactors, there's a bot near us," Supernova says over his comm as 
he flies, "Its an Alliance bot. We land and pick him up, then head 
back to base."

The two jets (Supernova/Flare making up one, Vycir/Scrap/Slasys the 
other) lower altitude, landing near Bonzai-Tron. They both 
transformed back into the seperate bots, Scrap kneeling down near 
Bonzai-Tron.

"Think you can stabolize his condition?" Supernova asks, coming near 
and also looking at Bonzai-Tron.

"I could stabalize a dead rat," Scrap replies, already working on 
repairing the critical circuits that were damaged in Bonzai-Tron. He 
was a proffessional, very good at his job.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Astral nods, all the Lavacons but Fenox (who was in the Iron Fist), 
flying off after Wheeljack, Recklessa carrying Griplash.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Wheeljack/Hun-Grr/Banzai-Tron/Airazor:::
> 
> Wheeljack: Then lets do that.  I think we can get this project done 
in a 
> flash with the proper materials, so lets salvage the ship.
> ::He heads for the mainland::
> ~~~~~
> ::As he sees Condor fall into stasis lock, he starts laughing 
maniacally, but 
> when he sees the spider explode under Sinnertwin, he looks at 
Switchblade::
> Hun-Grr: What for you try to explode us?
> ~~~~~
> ::Banzai-Tron was in heavy stasis lock, with his spark punctured as 
well. He 
> needed repairs quick, or he'd die::
> ~~~~~
> ::Airazor starting to come to.  Memories of a huge bot that tried 
to kill her 
> flshed in her head. She looks over to Tigerhawk::
> Airazor: Wh-what happened?
